name: Bench Press
description: A strength training exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps by pressing a weighted barbell from the chest upward.

name: Squat
description: A foundational lower-body exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, hamstrings, and core by bending the knees and lowering the hips.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body compound movement that primarily works the lower back, glutes, hamstrings, and traps by lifting a loaded barbell off the ground.

name: Barbell Curl
description: A strength-building exercise that focuses on the biceps, performed by curling a barbell from the thighs to the shoulders.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An upper-body exercise that targets the deltoid muscles by pressing dumbbells or a barbell overhead.

name: Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise that targets the lateral head of the deltoid muscles by lifting dumbbells to the side.
